purpose.para: This class template contains the meta_class_attributes reflecting the individual attributes of a class. More precisely, all attributes including the inherited ones. To inspect only the "own" attributes of a class, not including the inherited ones, use the specializations of the meta_class_attributes template. template.
The meta_class_all_attributes template should not be instantiated directly, meta_class_all_attributes are obtained only as result of introspection operations on meta_class.

The individual meta_class_attributes and iterators pointing to them should be obtained as results of the meta-object-sequence algoritms. See the examples for more details on usage of meta_class_all_attributes.
